name: IEntityAdditionalSpawnData
description: A interface for Entities that need extra information to be communicated between the server and client when they are spawned.

methods.name: writeSpawnData
methods.description: Called by the server when constructing the spawn packet. Data should be added to the provided stream.

methods.name: readSpawnData
methods.description: Called by the client when it receives a Entity spawn packet. Data should be read out of the stream in the same way as it was written.
